# Age and sex subdomain

### **Variable label**: Age of participant   
**Variable name**: sdc_age_0      
**Validation script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
summ(sdc_LUCAS_0$sdc_age_0)  
```
**Validation comment**

### **Variable label**: Gender of participant   
**Variable name**: sdc_gender_0   
**Validation script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
AfterH<-table(sdc_LUCAS_0$sdc_gender_0,useNA = "always")
X<-table(lucas_w2$SexCd_07,useNA = "always")
BeforeH<-c(X["2"],X["1"],sum(is.na(lucas_w2$SexCd_07)))
C<-rbind(AfterH,BeforeH)
colnames(C)<-c("0","1","NA")

summ(as.factor(sdc_LUCAS_0$sdc_gender_0))
```
**Validation comment**

### **Variable label**: Highest level of education completed (ISCED 2011)    
**Variable name**: sdc_highest_edu_0 
**Validation script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
AfterH<-table(sdc_LUCAS_0$sdc_highest_edu_0,useNA = "always")
X<-table(lucas_w2$Schule_07,useNA = "always")
BeforeH<-c(sum(X[c("3","4","5","6")]),X["2"],X["1"],sum(is.na(lucas_w2$Schule_07)))
C<-rbind(AfterH,BeforeH)
colnames(C)<-c("1","2","3","NA")

```
**Validation comment**
